description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b. Physical description: 25 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication. Mild staining. Origin: Jumādá I 1244 H [November 1828], by Qurbān ʻAlī al-Khurāsānī (leaf 241a). Incipit: الحمد لله المتفضل بشرح معالم شريعته لإرشاد الأنام المتطول بارسال الرسل
author: Shahīd al-Thānī, Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī, 1506-1559
abstract: Commentary on the sections on ṭahārah and ṣalāh from Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī's Irshād al-adhhān ilá aḥkām al-īmān.
extent: 241 leaves : paper ; 300 x 193 (218 x 118) mm bound to 303 x 193 mm
title: Rawḍ al-jinān
uniform_title: روض الجنان في شرح ارشاد الاذهان
creator: شهيد الثاني، زين الدين بن علي، 1506-1559،
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Irshād al-adhhān ilá aḥkām al-īmān.
binding_note: Full golden brown leather with red leather spine and edges; blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants and fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
